title: The Adventures of Romeo Collins: Tutor by Day, Hero by Night

story.text: Romeo Collins begins his week as usual, tutoring local students in science and maths. By nightfall, he patrols the city, looking to thwart petty criminals and ensure safety.
While tutoring, Romeo overhears a plot to rob the city bank. He memorizes the voices of the culprits planning the heist.
Romeo uses his networking skills to gather more information about the planned bank heist and prepares himself with gadgets to prevent it.
During his night patrol, Romeo encounters a group of robbers matching the voices he overheard. Using non-lethal gadgets, he successfully foils the heist and notifies the authorities.
The city's mayor publicly thanks the mysterious hero, dubbing him 'The Guardian Tutor'. Romeo feels a profound pride swell within him, knowing his dual life is making a difference.
Inspired by the week's events, Romeo expands his tutoring to include self-defense classes, empowering his students to protect themselves.
After a fulfilling week, Romeo prepares lesson plans and upgrades his gadgets, ready for whatever the next week might bring.

moral: With great power comes great responsibility; use your skills and knowledge to empower and protect.
